headline: Assessing Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) has been drawing attention after a period of strong share performance, with investors weighing its recent returns against fundamentals such as annual revenue of US$12.0b and net income of US$569.0m. See our latest analysis for Huntington Ingalls Industries. Huntington Ingalls Industries’ share price has picked up strong momentum recently, with a 20.17% 1 month share price return, a 33.74% 3 month gain and a 104.22% 1 year total shareholder return.
